info.name: UPS Tracking
info.description:
Track status of a shipment, delivery, time, and the latest transit scan.

Visit the full [UPS Tracking Documentation](https://developer.ups.com/api/reference?loc=en_US#tag/Tracking_other) for more details!

request.description: This HTTP GET request allows users to provide a UPS 1Z tracking number as an **inquiryNumber** in order to receive details on that package's movement through the UPS system.

response.name: Tracking Success
